definitions.definition: The attribute or characteristic of acting in secrecy , or in such a way that the actions are unnoticed or difficult to detect by others.
An act of secrecy, especially one involving thievery .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The attribute or characteristic of acting in secrecy , or in such a way that the actions are unnoticed or difficult to detect by others.
secondary_definitions: ( archaic , countable ) An act of secrecy, especially one involving thievery .
